segments.text: This drawing captures a chaotic kitchen perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, drying that plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, puddle widening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face shows total absorption.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot in the wet spot, apron untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool toward cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the jar, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting, he could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's cooperating, arm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Clear counter below, no obstacles there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks inviting and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this mischief will end in a splash.
segments.speaker: PAR
